Blog

Read our latest articles about cybersecurity, student success, and our events.

Post 1 through 6 of 14 total posts

  • DUCA x DDSC Networking Night

    DUCA and DDSC joined forces for a high-energy networking night on September 5th, 2025, featuring cybersecurity career insights from Commonwealth Bank, AI and research guidance, plus networking and community building.

    Author: Hirusha Adikari

  • DUCA Cat Attends the Inaugural BSides Ballarat 2025

    DUCA Cat had a blast at BSides Ballarat 2025! Highlights included talks on human-centric cybersecurity, digital footprint awareness, CTI automation, and navigating growth in cyber careers.

    Author: Paige Haines

  • Exploring ADF Careers and the Role of Cyber Warfare on ANZAC Day

    On ANZAC Day, we explored ADF careers and the growing role of cyber warfare, gaining insights from Colonel Molnar, Captain Lever, and Cyber Warfare Officer Elliot Parker.

    Author: Paige Haines

  • Cracking Clues and Catching Flags with DUCA

    An OSINT-focused CTF challenged participants to uncover hidden clues using metadata, search techniques, and visual analysis, sharpening investigative thinking and practical open-source intelligence skills.

    Author: Paige Haines

  • Lessons from Our Live Ransomware Simulation

    A hands-on ransomware simulation demonstrated real attack mechanics, major incidents, and practical defenses, helping participants understand how ransomware spreads, encrypts data, and why preparation matters.

    Author: Paige Haines

  • Career Insights from Mack Heath and Aadhi Sivaramakrishnan

    Industry and academic perspectives converged as two Accenture professionals shared practical advice on careers, certifications, leadership growth, emerging trends, and bridging university learning with real-world cybersecurity practice.

    Author: Paige Haines

Footer

The Deakin University Cybersecurity Association (DUCA) is a student-led community driven by the ambition and dedication of its members. DUCA is a launchpad for the next generation of cybersecurity professionals.
